key.name: shift-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Shift modifier is active.

key.name: caps-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Caps Lock modifier is active.

key.name: control-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Control modifier is active.

key.name: mod1-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Mod1/Alt modifier is active.

key.name: mod2-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Mod2/Num Lock modifier is active.

key.name: mod3-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Mod3/Scroll Lock modifier is active.

key.name: mod4-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Mod4/Super modifier is active.

key.name: mod5-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when the Mod5/AltGr modifier is active.

key.name: latch-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when a modifier is latched.

key.name: lock-symbol
key.description: Symbol displayed when a modifier is locked.

key.name: icon
key.description: Optional symbol shown before the modifier list.

key.name: opening
key.description: String placed before the modifier state display.

key.name: closing
key.description: String placed after the modifier state display.
